usageDefault: Set an intention before each dose.
Start with 5 drops daily; gradually increase up to 20 drops twice/day (after breakfast & lunch).
Follow a 5–7 days on / 2–3 days off cycle.
Can be used in successive rounds.
warningsDefault: For educational use only. Not medical advice.
Do not use if pregnant or breastfeeding.
Avoid combining with alcohol, stimulants, or contraindicated medications (particularly those affecting heart rhythm or serotonergic load).
Consult a qualified healthcare provider if you have a heart, liver, or psychiatric condition.

promoBanner.heading: What Is Meso?
promoBanner.intro: Meso is the practice of meeting yourself halfway. It’s especially suited for those who find that microdosing doesn’t quite fit, with the guiding ethos of not too little, not too much, but just enough to notice. As a ritual, it weaves awareness into daily life, helping you stay grounded while creating space for deeper self-inquiry and change.This isn’t a solitary road; each person’s practice is a drop that rings outward, and in those ripples our mesodosing community finds presence, balance, and real connection.
promoBanner.imageWrapClass: absolute left-1/2 top-0 -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-11 sm:left-10 sm:translate-x-10 sm:-translate-y-10
textLines: We are so sure you’re going to love it, so we invite you to try before you buy
You only pay the postage. Contact us directly for enquiries.

howItWorks.heading: How does Meso work?
howItWorks.subheading: Meso tinctures are plant based liquid technologies that emit waves of stillness through the body, by calming the nervous system.

steps.title: Shake & dose
steps.text: Shake the bottle. Place 20-30 drops of Meso under your tongue. Find your way.

steps.title: Tune in & notice
steps.text: Meso emits a calm vibration that soothes your nervous system.

steps.title: Go into nature
steps.text: Get away from your usual environment to mindfully notice the changes within.

howItWorks.disclaimer: Start low and adjust slowly. See label for guidance. For general wellness.

heroWithVideo.heading: How’s your nervous system doing now?
heroWithVideo.subheading: Your body has a built-in calm switch—the vagus nerve—that helps you settle after everyday stress. A simple ritual with Meso can support a more balanced, relaxed state over time.
heroWithVideo.disclaimer: * Results and timing vary. For general wellness; not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

caroussel.title: Meso Stories
paragraphs: Meso cares about its community and the wider wellness space. Here’s what some of our customers are saying:

items.headline: “Focused work mode in minutes”
items.body: “20 drops, slow breaths, and I’m ready for calls—focused without the jitters.”
items.author: Priya S., London, UK

items.headline: “Clearer mornings”
items.body: “I keep Meso in my handbag. Less fog, more clarity during the day.”
items.author: Teri R., Dublin, IE

items.headline: “Feet on the ground”
items.body: “When the day tailspins, this helps me feel anchored and steady.”
items.author: Ana M., Porto, PT

items.headline: “Less reactive, more present”
items.body: “I notice a pause before I react. Conversations feel easier and calmer.”
items.author: Marcus D., Austin, TX

items.headline: “Softer edges to anxiety”
items.body: “A few drops help take the edge off those nervous flutters, subtle but noticeable.”
items.author: Lila K., Seattle, WA

items.headline: “Creative flow switch”
items.body: “I use it before writing sessions. Ideas connect and my creative flow lasts longer.”
items.author: Javier P., Barcelona, ES

items.headline: “From scattered to centered”
items.body: “Great mid-day reset after screen overload. My focus comes back online, especially if I go for a walk.”
items.author: Chen W., Vancouver, CA

items.headline: “Calm focus for deep work”
items.body: “Pairs perfectly with my noise-cancelling headphones. I get into the zone faster.”
items.author: Naomi B., New York, NY

items.headline: “Parenting is easier”
items.body: “I’m less snappy during the dinner rush: more patience, more presence.”
items.author: Sofia L., Toronto, CA

items.headline: “Gentle wind-down, sharper start”
items.body: “I take it after lunch to unwind in the evenings. When I take it in the mornings, I feel clearer and more intentional.”
items.author: Hugo F., Lisbon, PT

items.headline: “More Intense Dreams”
items.body: “I was never one to recall my dreams, or even have very interesting ones. Not so with Meso! Feels like I’m at the movies while I sleep.”
items.author: Josh, Australia

caroussel.disclaimer: Individual experiences may vary. Meso is a general wellness liquid technology and is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

items.quote: Works on concerns, such as post-traumatic stress disorder, depression, anxiety, or grief.
My mind has shifted now from what I used to be. I can look back at my childhood and deal with those issues without sobbing and feeling sorry for myself.
An experience that often causes users to take an unflinching and critical look at their lives.
I saw this really transform people by taking someone in an intractable cycle and breaking them free. — D.C. Mash, Professor of Neurology
It’s just going to go down there and basically pull up any traumas, anything hiding in your subconscious that may be affecting you that you don’t even realize.

items.a: Meso are plant-based drops used as a moderate daily ritual—more noticeable than a very light dose, yet still functional for everyday life. Think of it as the “sweet spot” between subtle and strong: a few drops, slow breaths, and ~10 minutes of unwind. Many people follow a simple rhythm (for example, 5–7 days on, 2–3 days off) to build consistency.

items.q: Can Meso help with sleep issues?
items.a: Some customers prefer to take Meso after lunch, as they’ve reported it can interfere with sleep. Others, on the contrary, have experienced more vivid dreams. Everyone is different, so pair your drops with healthy sleep habits (dim lights, no screens, gentle music) and see what works best for you.

items.q: How long does it take to see results?
items.a: Some people notice a shift within about 10–30 minutes of a dose; others feel benefits accumulate over a week or two with steady use. Treat it like a small daily practice; results and timing vary from person to person.

items.q: What’s the difference between microdosing and mesodosing?
items.a: Microdosing is often described as “just-below-perception.” Mesodosing is a touch more noticeable while remaining manageable for daily life, aimed at helping you stay present, notice patterns, and build new habits in real time.

We ship orders on business days and provide tracking once your parcel is on the way. Delivery times and fees depend on destination and carrier. Any customs duties or import taxes are the customer’s responsibility.

items.q: What countries do you ship to?
items.a:
We ship to the following countries: Australia, Brazil, Canada, Costa Rica, Denmark, Finland, Gabon, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Mexico, Netherlands, New Zealand, Portugal, South Africa, Uruguay. 

 If your contry is not listed enquire via Contact Form.
If your order arrives damaged or incorrect, contact us within 14 days with your order number and photos so we can help. Unopened items may be eligible for return subject to inspection.

community.heading: Join the Meso Movement.
community.body: We’re building a space for people who believe in balance, presence, and steady growth. Share your journey, from unboxing moments to personal reflections, to deeper personal insights and breakthroughs, and connect with others walking the same path.
community.socialsBlurb: Tag us, send your story, and be part of a community shaping the future of mindful practices.

disclaimer.heading: General wellness product. Not medical advice.
disclaimer.body: Not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. If pregnant, nursing, on medication, or unsure, consult a qualified professional first.
